--This function is sent a GUID for a script zone and it will return the GUID
--for the deck or card found in that zone.
function getDeckGUID(zoneGUID)
    deckZone = getObjectFromGUID(zoneGUID)
    objInZone = deckZone.getObjects()

    if #objInZone == 1 then
        deckGUID = objInZone[1].getGUID()
        return deckGUID
    else
        if arLogoToken ~= nil then
            string = 'Zone GUID ' .. tostring(zoneGUID) .. ' is empty or has more then one object'
            broadcastToAll(string, red)
        end
    end
end


--Used only to build data tables
function printData()
    objInZone = playerBoardZone.getObjects()
    msg = ""
    for _, obj in pairs(objInZone) do
        x = round(obj.getPosition().x,2)
        y = round(obj.getPosition().y,2)
        z = round(obj.getPosition().z,2)
        pos = "{" .. x .. "," .. y .. "," .. z .. "}"

        --msg = msg .. "{'" .. obj.getGUID() .. "',\t" .. pos .. "},\n"
        msg = msg .. "" .. pos .. ",\n"
    end
    --Notes.setNotes('')
    Notes.setNotes(msg)
end









function toggleLifeForms()

    if lifeForms == 'Intruders' then
        buttonBoard.editButton({index = 3, label ='Invading Life Forms: Carnomorphs'})
        lifeForms = 'Carnomorphs'

        setupResearch = nil
        buttonBoard.editButton({index = 6, label ='', click_function = 'none'})

    else
        if lifeForms == 'Carnomorphs' then
            buttonBoard.editButton({index = 3, label ='Invading Life Forms: Void Seeders'})
            buttonBoard.editButton({index = 5, label ='', click_function = 'none'})
            lifeForms = 'Void Seeders'

        else
            buttonBoard.editButton({index = 3, label ='Invading Life Forms: Intruders'})
            lifeForms = 'Intruders'

            setupResearch = nil
            setupNewRooms = nil
            buttonBoard.editButton({index = 6, label ='Research[ ]', click_function = 'toggleResearch'})
            buttonBoard.editButton({index = 5, label ='New Rooms[ ]', click_function = 'toggleNewRooms'})
        end

    end
end









function toggleAltBoard()
    if setupAltBoard ~= true then
        buttonBoard.editButton({index = 4, label ='Alt Board[X]'})
        setupAltBoard = true
    else
        buttonBoard.editButton({index = 4, label ='Alt Board[ ]'})
        setupAltBoard = false
    end
end



function toggleNewRooms()


    if setupResearch ~= true then

        if setupNewRooms ~= true then
            buttonBoard.editButton({index = 5, label ='New Rooms[X]'})
            setupNewRooms = true

        else
            buttonBoard.editButton({index = 5, label ='New Rooms[ ]'})
            setupNewRooms = false

        end

    else

        broadcastToAll('New Rooms content is required for Research Mode.', {1,1,1})

    end



end



function toggleResearch()
    if setupResearch ~= true then
        buttonBoard.editButton({index = 6, label ='Research[X]'})
        setupResearch = true

        buttonBoard.editButton({index = 5, label ='New Rooms[X]'})
        setupNewRooms = true
    else

        buttonBoard.editButton({index = 6, label ='Research[ ]'})
        setupResearch = false
    end

end





function setupNormalMode()
    gameMode = 'Normal'
    checkOptions()
end

function setupSoloCoopMode()
    gameMode = 'SoloCoop'
    checkOptions()
end






function checkOptions()

    --Clears the buttons from the game board
    buttonBoard.clearButtons()

    if lifeForms == 'Carnomorphs' then
        intruderWeakDeckGUID = getDeckGUID(intruderWeakZoneGUID)
        intruderWeakDeck = getObjectFromGUID(intruderWeakDeckGUID)
        objToRemoveTable = {intruderAttackDeck,eventDeck,intruderWeakDeck}
        for _, obj in pairs(objToRemoveTable) do
            gameBox.putObject(obj)
        end


        Wait.time(|| deployCarnomorphs(), 0.4)

    else
        if lifeForms == 'Void Seeders' then
            objToRemoveTable = {intruderAttackDeck,eventDeck}
            for _, obj in pairs(objToRemoveTable) do
                gameBox.putObject(obj)
            end


            Wait.time(|| deployVoidSeeders(), 0.4)

        end

    end

    broadcastToAll('Loading selected configuration.\nPlease hold. ', {1,1,1})

    if setupNewRooms == true then
        Wait.time(deployNewRooms, 2.5)
        Wait.time(setupGameBoard, 4.0)
        --Wait.time(getPlayerCount, 3.5)
    else
        Wait.time(setupGameBoard, 2.5)
        --Wait.time(getPlayerCount, 2.5)

    end

    if setupAltBoard == true then
        deployAltBoard()
    end

    if setupResearch == true then
        Wait.time(deployResearch, 0.4)

    end



    --Puts the Beard in the box to prevent onload functoin from starting initial setup
    gameBox.putObject(arLogoToken)

end




function deployCarnomorphs()

    deployPosTable = {
        {-16.36, 2.5, 25.58}, -- Mutation
        {-11.96, 2.5, 25.58}, -- Attack
        {-7.56, 2.5, 25.58},  -- Event
        {9.77, 2.5, 17.67},  -- Carno Adaptation
        {35.53, 2.5, 24.02}, -- Help Card Face
        {40.47, 2.5, 23.99}, -- Help Card Back
    }

    intruderDash.setState(2)

    --Add 3 eggs
    spawnPos = eggTokenStack.getPosition()

    for i=1, 3 do
        intruderEggBag.takeObject({
            position          = {spawnPos.x, 2+ i * 0.5, spawnPos.z},
            --rotation          = -- Vector [container rotation],
        })
    end




    --Rule Book
    carnomorphAssetBag.takeObject({
        position          = {35.5, 1.77, 32.7},
        smooth            = false,
    })

    --3rd Breeder Tokenf
    spawnPos = intruderBreederBag.getPosition()


    carnomorphAssetBag.takeObject({
        position          = {spawnPos.x,2.5,spawnPos.z},
        rotation          = {0.00, 180.00, 0.00},
        smooth            = true,
        callback_function = function() intruderBreederBag.shuffle() end,
    })



    for _, pos in pairs(deployPosTable) do
        carnomorphAssetBag.takeObject({
            position          = pos,
            rotation          = {0.00, 180.00, 180.00},
            callback_function = function(obj) obj.shuffle() end,

function deployResearch()

    Wait.time(deployAftermathShuttle, 3)




    --Deploy Discovery Token bag to the table.
    discoveryTokenBag.setPositionSmooth({-25.47, 1.47, 13.48}, false, false)
    discoveryTokenBag.setRotation({0.00, 180.00, 0.00})
    discoveryTokenBag.setInvisibleTo({})
    discoveryTokenBag.interactable = true






     if getObjectFromGUID(mainGameBoardGUID) ~= nil then
         tableToLoad = mainBoardExtraRoomsTable
     else
         tableToLoad = altBoardExtraRoomsTable
     end

     for _, pos in ipairs(tableToLoad) do
         discoveryTokenBag.takeObject({
             position          = pos,
             rotation          = {0,180,180}
         })
     end


    --Swaps the event deck
    spawnPos = eventDeck.getPosition()
    spawnRot = eventDeck.getRotation()
    gameBox.putObject(eventDeck)

    researchModeBag.takeObject({
        position          = spawnPos,
        rotation          = spawnRot,
        callback_function = function(obj) obj.shuffle() end,
        smooth            = true,
    })





    spawnPos = exploreTokenBag.getPosition()
    spawnRot = exploreTokenBag.getRotation()
    gameBox.putObject(exploreTokenBag)

    researchModeBag.takeObject({
        position          = spawnPos,
        rotation          = spawnRot,
        callback_function = function(obj) afterSpawn(obj) end,
        smooth            = true,
    })






    --Removes two eggs from the intruder board
    gameBoxPos = gameBox.getPosition()
    for i=1, 2 do
        if eggTokenStack.getGUID() ~= nil then
            eggTokenStack.takeObject({
                position          = {gameBoxPos[1], gameBoxPos[2] + 1, gameBoxPos[3]},
                smooth            = true,
            })
        else
            broadcastToAll('If Possible, remove 2 eggs from the nest', {1,1,1})

    end


    --Add Breeder and Creeper to Intruder Bag
    intruderBagPos = intrudersBag.getPosition()
    aboveIntruderBag = {intruderBagPos.x,3,intruderBagPos.z}



    intruderCreeperBag.takeObject({
        position          = aboveIntruderBag,
    })

    aboveIntruderBag[2] = aboveIntruderBag[2] + 0.5
    intruderBreederBag.takeObject({
        position          = aboveIntruderBag,
    })




    --add extra breeder from main box

function setupGameBoard()



    buildPositionsTable()

    exploreTokenBag.shuffle()


    intruderWeakPosTable = {{15.03, 1.9, 17.67},{17.73, 1.9, 17.67},{20.49, 1.9, 17.67}}

    if getObjectFromGUID(mainGameBoardGUID) ~= nil then
        tableToLoad = normalGamePiecePosTable
    else
        tableToLoad = altGamePiecePosTable
    end



    --Loop to pull room tiles from the bag and place them on the board
    for _, entries in ipairs(tableToLoad) do

            --pulls the object from each Room container and places them on the board
        entries.objToPullFrom.takeObject({
            position       = entries.pos_object,
            rotation       = entries.rot_object,
        })

        if entries.objToPullFrom == exploreTokenBag and setupResearch == true then

            newPos = {entries.pos_object[1] + 1.1, entries.pos_object[2], entries.pos_object[3] + 1.1}
            discoveryTokenBag.takeObject({
                position       = newPos,
                rotation       = {0,180,180},
            })
        end
    end

    --If playing void seeders it will deploy the last eploration tokens to the engine Rooms
    if lifeForms == 'Void Seeders' then
        if getObjectFromGUID(mainGameBoardGUID) ~= nil then
            tableToLoad = mainBoardExtraRoomsTable
        else
            tableToLoad = altBoardExtraRoomsTable
        end

        for i=1, 3 do
            exploreTokenBag.takeObject({
                position          = tableToLoad[i],
                rotation          = {0,210,180},
            })
        end

    end


    -- new code

    intruderWeakDeckGUID = getDeckGUID(intruderWeakZoneGUID)
    intruderWeakDeck = getObjectFromGUID(intruderWeakDeckGUID)

    for _, pos in pairs(intruderWeakPosTable) do
        intruderWeakDeck.takeObject({
            position          = pos,
            rotation          = {0, 180, 180},
        })
    end




    getPlayerCount()








end

    if #getSeatedPlayers() == playerCount then
        playerSetup()
    else

        buttonBoard.createButton(
            {click_function='playerSetup', function_owner=Global, label='Continue',

function playerSetup()

    intrudersBagSetup()

    buttonBoard.clearButtons()

    --builds player table again incase there was a change.
    playersInSeatTable = getSeatedPlayers()

    --This function will remove all game pieces not valild for the current player count
    removeUnusedGamePieces()


    if gameMode == 'Normal' then

        --Script for a "Normal" game
        for i, entries in ipairs(playersInSeatTable) do

            turnOrderBag.deal(1, entries, int)

            personalObjectivesDeck.deal(1, entries, int)
            corporateObjectivesDeck.deal(1, entries, int)

        end

    else

        --Script for a Solo/Coop game
        for i, entries in ipairs(playersInSeatTable) do

            turnOrderBag.deal(1, entries, int)
            soloCoopObjectiveDeck.deal(1, entries, int)
            --deals a second card for solo play
            if playerCount == 1 then
                soloCoopObjectiveDeck.deal(1, entries, int)
            end
        end


    end




    --Creates the button to call board setup function
    buttonBoard.createButton(
        {click_function='playersReadyCheck', function_owner=Global, label='Begin Game',
        position={0.0,1.5,0.5}, rotation={0,0,0}, width=3000, height=425, font_size=350,
        scale={0.2,0.2,0.2}}
    )


    --buttonBoard.createButton(
        --{click_function='skipSetup', function_owner=Global, label='Skip',
        --position={0.442,0.15,0.75}, rotation={0,0,0}, width=900, height=425, font_size=350,
        --scale={0.2,0.2,0.2}}
    --)

    note = 'Each player will need to select a Crew Member using the Crew Member Deck. Draw two cards and keep one. Put the unselected card back in the deck and shuffle it for the next player.\n\n'
    note = note .. 'Once everyone is ready select Begin Game. \n\n\n\n'
    note = note .. 'Thank you for choosing Nemesis and Fly Safe.'

    setNotes(note)

    Timer.create({
        identifier     = 'buildCrewButtons',
        function_name  = 'buildCrewPickButtons',
        function_owner = self,
        delay          = 0.5,
    })

end













function intrudersBagSetup()

    intruderBagPos = intrudersBag.getPosition()
    aboveIntruderBag = {intruderBagPos.x,3,intruderBagPos.z}

    if lifeForms == 'Intruders' then
        --Intruders




        -- Adds 4 larva tokens
        for i=1, 4 do

            intruderLarvaBag.takeObject({
                position       = aboveIntruderBag,
            })
            aboveIntruderBag[2] = aboveIntruderBag[2] + 0.5
        end

        -- Add 1 Queen

        intrudersBag.putObject(intruderQueen)


        -- Adds 1 Creeper
        for i=1, 1 do

            intruderCreeperBag.takeObject({
                position       = aboveIntruderBag,
            })
            aboveIntruderBag[2] = aboveIntruderBag[2] + 0.5
        end




        --Adds the 3 starting adult intruder tokens to the Intruder bag.


        for i=1, 3 do

            intruderAdultBag.takeObject({
                position       = aboveIntruderBag,
            })
            aboveIntruderBag[2] = aboveIntruderBag[2] + 0.5
        end

        for i=1, playerCount do
            --Adds one adult intruder for that playerCount
            intruderAdultBag.takeObject({
                position       = aboveIntruderBag,
            })
            aboveIntruderBag[2] = aboveIntruderBag[2] + 0.5
        end






    else
        if lifeForms == 'Carnomorphs' then
            --Carnomorphs
            for i=1, 2 do

                redMetagorgerBag.takeObject({
                    position       = aboveIntruderBag,
                })
                aboveIntruderBag[2] = aboveIntruderBag[2] + 0.5

                blueMetagorgerBag.takeObject({
                    position       = aboveIntruderBag,
                })
                aboveIntruderBag[2] = aboveIntruderBag[2] + 0.5

            end

            tokenIndex = 0
            for i=1, 3 do


                redMetagorgerBag.takeObject({
                    position       = aboveIntruderBag,
                })
                aboveIntruderBag[2] = aboveIntruderBag[2] + 0.5

                tokenIndex = tokenIndex + 1
                if tokenIndex == playerCount then break end

                blueMetagorgerBag.takeObject({
                    position       = aboveIntruderBag,
                })
                aboveIntruderBag[2] = aboveIntruderBag[2] + 0.5

                tokenIndex = tokenIndex + 1
                if tokenIndex == playerCount then break end

            end
        else
            --Void seeders
            voidSeedTokenBag = getObjectFromGUID(voidSeedTokenBagGUID)

            -- Adds one void seed token for each player plus two.
            for i=1, playerCount + 2 do
                --Adds one adult intruder for that playerCount
                voidSeedTokenBag.takeObject({
                    position       = aboveIntruderBag,
                    rotation       = {0.00, 180.00, 180.00}
                })
                aboveIntruderBag[2] = aboveIntruderBag[2] + 0.5
            end
        end







    end

    intrudersBag.shuffle()


end




function playersReadyCheck()
    playersReady = 0
    for i, playMat in pairs(playerMatTable) do

        if playMat.getButtons() == nil then
            playersReady = playersReady +1
        end
    end

    if playersReady >= playerCount then
        finalSetup()
    else
        broadcastToAll('Not all players are ready.', {1,1,1})
    end

end











function finalSetup()


    if setupResearch == nil and getObjectFromGUID(carnomorphRuleGUID) == nil and getObjectFromGUID(voidSeederRuleGUID) == nil then
        buildEpilogueButton()
    end


    note = '\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n'
    note = note .. 'AR is wanting to hear your feedback on all Nemesis Expansions. Please send your thoughts to feedback@awakenrealms.com. \n'
    note = note .. 'Any rule question? \n\n'
    note = note .. '- FAQ: https://goo.gl/qSyz49 \n\n'

    setNotes(note)


    objToPutAwayTable = {
        buttonBoard,levelOneRoomBag,levelTwoRoomBag,coordinateDeck,
        personalObjectivesDeck,corporateObjectivesDeck,soloCoopObjectiveDeck,
        turnOrderBag,crewMemberDeck,amCrewMemberDeck,intruderWeakDeck
    }

    for _, obj in pairs(objToPutAwayTable) do
        if getObjectFromGUID(obj.guid) ~= nil then
            gameBox.putObject(obj)
        end
    end



    --Removes unused player boards.
    for i, playMat in pairs(playerMatTable) do

        if playMat.getButtons() ~= nil then
            gameBox.putObject(playMat)
            getObjectFromGUID(playerCubeBagGUIDTable[i]).destruct()
        end
    end
end

function pickCrewMember(passTable)
    --Table index 1 is playerIndex -passTable[1]
    --Table index 2 is crewMemberIndex - passTable[2]
    playerIndex = passTable[1]
    crewMemberIndex = passTable[2]

    currentPlayerZone = getObjectFromGUID(playerMatZoneGUIDTable[playerIndex])
    currentPlayerMat = playerMatTable[playerIndex]






    -- Finds the help card and objective cards so it doesnt get wiped
    --objZone01 = getObjectFromGUID(helpCardZoneGUIDTable[playerIndex]).getObjects()[1]
    --objZone02 = getObjectFromGUID(objectiveCardZoneGUIDTable[playerIndex]).getObjects()[1]
    --Clears the players mat if there is anything present
    objInZone = currentPlayerZone.getObjects()

    trashBag = getObjectFromGUID(trashBagGUID)

    for _, obj in pairs(objInZone) do
        if obj.tag ~= 'Infinite' and obj.tag ~= 'Dice' and obj.getName() ~= 'Objective' and obj.getName() ~= 'Help Card' then

            if getObjectFromGUID(trashBagGUID) ~= nil then
                trashBag.putObject(obj)
            else
                obj.destruct()
            end
        end
    end






    --Clone the bag

    clonedBag =  getObjectFromGUID(crewBagsGUIDTable[crewMemberIndex]).clone({position     = {0,5,0},})
    clonedBag.setLock(true)


    --LEft hand {-1.88, 3.18, -2.44}
    crewDeployPosTable = {{-8.77, 3, 2.29},{0.65, 3, -2.44},{4.57, 3, -1.98},{4.57, 3, -4.52}}
    crewDeployRotTable = {{0, 180, 180},{0, 180, 0},{0, 90, 180},{0, 90, 180}}

    playerMatPos = currentPlayerMat.getPosition()



    miniPos = {playerMatPos[1] + 4.57, 2.5, playerMatPos[3] + 1}
    --Deploy the mini
    clonedBag.takeObject({
        position          = miniPos,
        rotation          = {0,0,0},
    })

    --Deploys Bounty Hunters unique items
    if crewMemberIndex == 10 then
        nextFigure = {miniPos[1] + 1.6, 2.5, miniPos[3]}
        clonedBag.takeObject({
            position          = nextFigure,
            rotation          = {0,0,0},
        })

        --Second Starting Item
        newPos = {playerMatPos[1] + -1.88, 2.5, playerMatPos[3] + -2.44}

        clonedBag.takeObject({
            position          = newPos,
            rotation          = {0,180,0},
        })

    end









    --Place trait card if AM crew and Bounty Hunter stuff


    if crewMemberIndex >= 7 then

        newPos = {playerMatPos[1] + -3.49, 2.5, playerMatPos[3] + -6.76}

        clonedBag.takeObject({
            position          = newPos,
            rotation          = {0,90,0},
        })

    end




    -- for each obj in the selected crew bag
    --order - crew mat - deck - items

    newPos = {playerMatPos[1] + -2.17, 1.58, playerMatPos[3] + 2.18}

    clonedBag.takeObject({
        position          = newPos,
        rotation          = {0,180,0},
        callback_function  = function(obj) obj.setLock(true) end,
    })







    bagCount = #clonedBag.getObjects()


    for i=1,  bagCount do
        originPos = crewDeployPosTable[i]

        newPos = {playerMatPos[1] + originPos[1], 2.5, playerMatPos[3] + originPos[3]}

        clonedBag.takeObject({
            position          = newPos,
            rotation          = crewDeployRotTable[i],
            callback_function = function(obj) if obj.tag == 'Deck' then obj.shuffle() end end,
        })
    end

    playersSelectionTable[playerIndex] = crewMemberIndex

    clonedBag.destruct()

end






function confirmCrewMember(playerIndex)

    if playersSelectionTable[playerIndex] ~= 0 then

        currentPlayerMat = playerMatTable[playerIndex]
        currentPlayerMat.clearButtons()

        --this loop will remove the buttons for the sleceted crew from the other boards.

        selectionIndex = playersSelectionTable[playerIndex]


        if selectionIndex == 1 or selectionIndex == 7 then
            buttonIndexTable = {0,6}
            voidSeedPlayerColorIndex = 1
        else
            if selectionIndex == 2 or selectionIndex == 8 then
                buttonIndexTable = {1,7}
                voidSeedPlayerColorIndex = 2
            else
                if selectionIndex == 3 or selectionIndex == 9 then
                    buttonIndexTable = {2,8}
                    voidSeedPlayerColorIndex = 3
                else
                    if selectionIndex == 4 or selectionIndex == 10 then
                        buttonIndexTable = {3,9}
                        voidSeedPlayerColorIndex = 4
                    else
                        if selectionIndex == 5 or selectionIndex == 11 then
                            buttonIndexTable = {4,10}
                            voidSeedPlayerColorIndex = 5
                        else
                            if selectionIndex == 6 then
                                buttonIndexTable = {5}
                                voidSeedPlayerColorIndex = 6
                            else
                                if selectionIndex == 12 then
                                    buttonIndexTable = {11}
                                    voidSeedPlayerColorIndex = 7
                                else
                                    broadcastToAll('Please Pick a CreMember', {0.905, 0.898, 0.172})
                                end
                            end
                        end
                    end
                end
            end
        end

        if lifeForms == 'Void Seeders' then
            voidSeedPlayerColorTokenBag.takeObject({
                position          = aboveIntruderBag,
                --rotation          = -- Vector [container rotation],
                guid              = voidSeedPlayerColorTokenGUIDTable[voidSeedPlayerColorIndex],
            })
            aboveIntruderBag[2] = aboveIntruderBag[2] +0.5

            voidSeedAssetBag.takeObject({
                position          = playerInsanityCardPosTable[playerIndex],
                --rotation          = -- Vector [container rotation],
                callback_function = function(obj) obj.setLock(true) end,
            })
        end

        --Deals second corpate card if player in an Android.
        if selectionIndex == 8 then
            corporateObjectivesDeck.deal(1, playerColorTable[playerIndex])
            msg = playerColorTable[playerIndex] .. ' player must discard their Personal Objective card.'
            broadcastToAll(msg, {1,1,1})
        end

        for _, buttonIndex in pairs(buttonIndexTable) do
            for _, playMat in pairs(playerMatTable) do

                if playMat.getButtons() ~= nil then
                    playMat.editButton({
                        index          = buttonIndex,
                        click_function = 'crewNotAvailable',
                        function_owner = Global,
                        label          = '',
                        color          = {0.5,0.5,0.5}
                    })
                end
            end
        end


        figureMainPosTable = {{1.38, 2.2, 0.31},{2.66, 2.2, 1.68},{2.62, 2.2, -1.31},{0.86, 2.2, -2.43},{0.50, 2.2, 2.64}}
        figureAltPosTable = {{-8.08, 2.2, 0.50},{-7.28, 2.2, 2.17},{-6.78, 2.2, -1.11},{-8.08, 2.2, -2.86},{-7.92, 2.2, 4.07}}
        figureShuttlePosTable = {{27.80, 1.92, 11.77},{25.35, 1.92, 10.76},{28.10, 1.92, 13.53},{28.18, 1.92, 10.01},{25.38, 1.92, 12.56}}

        if epilogueMode ~= true then
            if getObjectFromGUID(aftermathBoardGUID) ~= nil then
                posTable = figureShuttlePosTable
            else
                if getObjectFromGUID(mainGameBoardGUID) ~= nil then
                    posTable = figureMainPosTable
                else
                    posTable = figureAltPosTable
                end
            end

            objInZone = getObjectFromGUID(playerMatZoneGUIDTable[playerIndex]).getObjects()

            spawnPos = posTable[playerIndex]
            for _, obj in pairs(objInZone) do
                if obj.getDescription() == 'Figure' then
                    obj.setPosition(spawnPos)
                    spawnPos = {spawnPos[1] + 1.2, 3, spawnPos[3]}
                end
            end
        end



    else
        broadcastToAll('Please chose a Crew Member.', {1,1,1})
    end





end

    if playerCount <= 3 then

        for _, entries in ipairs(personalObjective4PCardGUIDsTable) do
            personalObjectivesDeck.takeObject({
                position       = aboveGameBox,
                guid           = entries,
            })
            aboveGameBox.y = aboveGameBox.y+2
        end

        for _, entries in ipairs(corporateObjective4PCardGUIDsTable) do
            corporateObjectivesDeck.takeObject({
                position       = aboveGameBox,
                guid           = entries,
            })
            aboveGameBox.y = aboveGameBox.y+2
        end




    end

    if playerCount <= 2 then
        turnOrderBag.takeObject({
            position       = aboveGameBox,
            guid           = turnOrderThreeCardGUID,
        })
        aboveGameBox.y = aboveGameBox.y+2

        for _, entries in ipairs(personalObjective3PCardGUIDsTable) do
            personalObjectivesDeck.takeObject({
                position       = aboveGameBox,
                guid           = entries,
            })
            aboveGameBox.y = aboveGameBox.y+2
        end

        for _, entries in ipairs(corporateObjective3PCardGUIDsTable) do
            corporateObjectivesDeck.takeObject({
                position       = aboveGameBox,
                guid           = entries,
            })
            aboveGameBox.y = aboveGameBox.y+2
        end

        if setupResearch ~= true then
            gameBox.putObject(getObjectFromGUID(escapePodThreeGUID))
        else
            gameBox.putObject(getObjectFromGUID(escapePodTwoGUID))
        end


    end

    if playerCount == 1 then
        turnOrderBag.takeObject({
            position       = aboveGameBox,
            guid           = turnOrderTwoCardGUID,
        })

    end

function shuffleCheck()

    currentCountInBag = intrudersBag.getObjects()

    if getObjectFromGUID(contaminationDeck.guid) ~= nil then
        currentCountInDeck = contaminationDeck.getObjects()
    end


    --sets the initial count for these variables
    if contaminationCount == nil or intruderPoolCount == nil then
        contaminationCount  = 25
        intruderPoolCount =  8
    end


    if #currentCountInBag > intruderPoolCount then
        intrudersBag.shuffle()
        intruderPoolCount = #currentCountInBag
    else
        intruderPoolCount = #currentCountInBag
    end

    if #contaminationDeckZone.getObjects() ~= 0 then
        if getObjectFromGUID(contaminationDeck.guid) ~= nil then
            if #currentCountInDeck > contaminationCount then
                contaminationDeck.shuffle()
                contaminationCount = #currentCountInDeck
            else
                contaminationCount = #currentCountInDeck
            end
        else
            objInContamDeckZone = contaminationDeckZone.getObjects()

            if objInContamDeckZone[1].tag == 'Deck' then
                contaminationDeck = objInContamDeckZone[1]
                contaminationDeck.shuffle()
            end
        end
    else
        contaminationCount = 0
    end

end

        broadcastToAll('Too many objects near the active Coodinates card.\n Manualy add this card to the deck, shuffle and then draw a new card.', {1,1,1})

     if getObjectFromGUID(mainGameBoardGUID) ~= nil then

     for _, pos in ipairs(tableToLoad) do
         discoveryTokenBag.takeObject({
             position          = pos,

     --Delpoy tablet
     aftermathBox.takeObject({

     --Depoy Personal Objective and Lucrative Offer

     })



     --remove noise and fire tokens

     objInZone = playerBoardZone.getObjects()

     for _, obj in pairs(objInZone) do
         if obj.getName() == 'Noise' then
             obj.destruct()

ObjectStates.Name: Chinese_Checkers_Piece
ObjectStates.LuaScript:
--Felx Table was creatd by MrStump

tableHeightOffset = -9

function onSave()
    saved_data = JSON.encode({tid=tableImageData, cd=checkData})
    --saved_data = ""
    return saved_data
end

function onload(saved_data)
    --Loads the tracking for if the game has started yet
    if saved_data ~= "" then
         local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
         tableImageData = loaded_data.tid
         checkData = loaded_data.cd
    else
        tableImageData = {}
        checkData = {move=false, scale=false}
    end

    --Disables interactable status of objects with GUID in list
    for _, guid in ipairs(ref_noninteractable) do
        local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        if obj then obj.interactable = false end
    end

    --Establish references to table parts
    obj_leg1 = getObjectFromGUID("afc863")
    obj_leg2 = getObjectFromGUID("c8edca")
    obj_leg3 = getObjectFromGUID("393bf7")
    obj_leg4 = getObjectFromGUID("12c65e")
    obj_surface = getObjectFromGUID("4ee1f2")
    obj_side_top = getObjectFromGUID("35b95f")
    obj_side_bot = getObjectFromGUID("f938a2")
    obj_side_lef = getObjectFromGUID("9f95fd")
    obj_side_rig = getObjectFromGUID("5af8f2")

    controlActive = false
    createOpenCloseButton()
end



--Activation/deactivation of control panel



--Activated by clicking on
function click_toggleControl(_, color)
    if permissionCheck(color) then
        if not controlActive then
            --Activate control panel
            controlActive = true
            self.clearButtons()
            createOpenCloseButton()
            createSurfaceInput()
            createSurfaceButtons()
            createScaleInput()
            createScaleButtons()
        else
            --Deactivate control panel
            controlActive = false
            self.clearButtons()
            self.clearInputs()
            createOpenCloseButton()

        end
    end
end




--Table surface control



--Changes table surface
function click_applySurface(_, color)
    if permissionCheck(color) then
        updateSurface()
        broadcastToAll("New Table Image Applied", {0.2,0.9,0.2})
    end
end

--Saves table surface
function click_saveSurface(_, color)
    if permissionCheck(color) then
        local nickname = self.getInputs()[1].value
        local url = self.getInputs()[2].value
        if nickname == "" then
            --No nickname
            broadcastToAll("Please supply a nickname for this save.", {0.9,0.2,0.2})
        else
            --Nickname exists

            if findInImageDataIndex(url, nickname) == nil then
                --Save doesn't exist already
                table.insert(tableImageData, {url=url, name=nickname})
                broadcastToAll("Image URL saved to memory.", {0.2,0.9,0.2})
                --Refresh buttons
                self.clearButtons()
                createOpenCloseButton()
                createSurfaceButtons()
                createScaleButtons()
            else
                --Save exists already
                broadcastToAll("Memory already contains a save with this Name or URL. Delete it first.", {0.9,0.2,0.2})
            end
        end
    end
end

--Loads table surface
function click_loadMemory(_, color, index)
    if permissionCheck(color) then
        self.editInput({index=0, value=tableImageData[index].name})
        self.editInput({index=1, value=tableImageData[index].url})
        updateSurface()
        broadcastToAll("Table Image Loaded", {0.2,0.9,0.2})
    end
end

--Deletes table surface
function click_deleteMemory(_, color, index)
    if permissionCheck(color) then
        table.remove(tableImageData, index)
        self.clearButtons()
        createOpenCloseButton()
        createSurfaceButtons()
        createScaleButtons()
        broadcastToAll("Element Removed from Memory", {0.2,0.9,0.2})
    end
end

--Updates surface from the values in the input field
function updateSurface()
    local customInfo = obj_surface.getCustomObject()
    customInfo.diffuse = self.getInputs()[2].value
    obj_surface.setCustomObject(customInfo)
    obj_surface = obj_surface.reload()
end



--Table Scale control



--Applies Scale to table pieces
function click_applyScale(_, color)
    if permissionCheck(color) then
        local newWidth = tonumber(self.getInputs()[3].value)
        local newDepth = tonumber(self.getInputs()[4].value)
        if type(newWidth) ~= "number" then
            broadcastToAll("Invalid Width", {0.9,0.2,0.2})
            return
        elseif type(newDepth) ~= "number" then
            broadcastToAll("Invalid Depth", {0.9,0.2,0.2})
            return
        elseif newWidth<0.1 or newDepth<0.1 then
            broadcastToAll("Scale cannot go below 0.1", {0.9,0.2,0.2})
            return
        elseif newWidth>12 or newDepth>12 then
            broadcastToAll("Scale should not go over 12 (world size limitation)", {0.9,0.2,0.2})
            return
        else
            changeTableScale(math.abs(newWidth), math.abs(newDepth))
            broadcastToAll("Scale applied.", {0.2,0.9,0.2})
        end
    end
end

--Checks/unchecks move box for hands
function click_checkMove(_, color)
    if permissionCheck(color) then
        local find_func = function(o) return o.click_function=="click_checkMove" end
        if checkData.move == true then
            checkData.move = false
            local buttonEntry = findButton(self, find_func)
            self.editButton({index=buttonEntry.index, label=""})
        else
            checkData.move = true
            local buttonEntry = findButton(self, find_func)
            self.editButton({index=buttonEntry.index, label=string.char(10008)})
        end
    end
end

--Checks/unchecks scale box for hands
--This button was disabled for technical reasons
--[[
function click_checkScale(_, color)
    if permissionCheck(color) then
        local find_func = function(o) return o.click_function=="click_checkScale" end
        if checkData.scale == true then
            checkData.scale = false
            local buttonEntry = findButton(self, find_func)
            self.editButton({index=buttonEntry.index, label=""})
        else
            checkData.scale = true
            local buttonEntry = findButton(self, find_func)
            self.editButton({index=buttonEntry.index, label=string.char(10008)})
        end
    end
end
]]

--Alters scale of elements and moves them
function changeTableScale(width, depth)
    --Scaling factors used to translate scale to position offset
    local width2pos = (width-1) * 18
    local depth2pos = (depth-1) * 18

    --Hand zone movement
    if checkData.move == true then
        for _, pc in ipairs(ref_playerColor) do
            if Player[pc].getHandCount() > 0 then
                moveHandZone(Player[pc], width2pos, depth2pos)
            end
        end
    end
    --Hand zone scaling
    --The button to enable this was disabled for technical reasons
    if checkData.scale == true then
        for _, pc in ipairs(ref_playerColor) do
            if Player[pc].getHandCount() > 0 then
                scaleHandZone(Player[pc], width, depth)
            end
        end
    end

    --Resizing table elements
    obj_side_top.setScale({width, 1, 1})
    obj_side_bot.setScale({width, 1, 1})
    obj_side_lef.setScale({depth, 1, 1})
    obj_side_rig.setScale({depth, 1, 1})
    obj_surface.setScale({width, 1, depth})

    --Moving table elements to accomodate new scale
    obj_side_lef.setPosition({-width2pos,tableHeightOffset,0})
    obj_side_rig.setPosition({ width2pos,tableHeightOffset,0})
    obj_side_top.setPosition({0,tableHeightOffset, depth2pos})
    obj_side_bot.setPosition({0,tableHeightOffset,-depth2pos})
    obj_leg1.setPosition({-width2pos,tableHeightOffset,-depth2pos})
    obj_leg2.setPosition({-width2pos,tableHeightOffset, depth2pos})
    obj_leg3.setPosition({ width2pos,tableHeightOffset, depth2pos})
    obj_leg4.setPosition({ width2pos,tableHeightOffset,-depth2pos})
    self.setPosition(obj_leg4.positionToWorld({-22.12, 8.74,-19.16}))
    --Only enabled when changing tableHeightOffset
    --obj_surface.setPosition({0,tableHeightOffset,0})
end

--Move hand zone, p=player reference, facts are scaling factors
function moveHandZone(p, width2pos, depth2pos)
    local widthX = obj_side_rig.getPosition().x
    local depthZ = obj_side_top.getPosition().z
    for i=1, p.getHandCount() do
        local handT = p.getHandTransform()
        local pos = handT.position
        local y = handT.rotation.y

        if y<45 or y>320 or y>135 and y<225 then
            if pos.z > 0 then
                pos.z = pos.z + depth2pos - depthZ
            else
                pos.z = pos.z - depth2pos + depthZ
            end
        else
            if pos.x > 0 then
                pos.x = pos.x + width2pos - widthX
            else
                pos.x = pos.x - width2pos + widthX
            end
        end

        --Only enabled when changing tableHeightOffset
        --pos.y = tableHeightOffset + 14

        handT.position = pos
        p.setHandTransform(handT, i)
    end
end


---Scales hand zones, p=player reference, facts are scaling factors
function scaleHandZone(p, width, depth)
    local widthFact = width / obj_side_top.getScale().x
    local depthFact = depth / obj_side_lef.getScale().x
    for i=1, p.getHandCount() do
        local handT = p.getHandTransform()
        local scale = handT.scale
        local y = handT.rotation.y
        if y<45 or y>320 or y>135 and y<225 then
            scale.x = scale.x * widthFact
        else
            scale.x = scale.x * depthFact
        end
        handT.scale = scale
        p.setHandTransform(handT, i)
    end
end



--Information gathering



--Checks if a color is promoted or host
function permissionCheck(color)
    if Player[color].host==true or Player[color].promoted==true then
        return true
    else
        return false
    end
end

--Locates a string saved within memory file
function findInImageDataIndex(...)
    for _, str in ipairs({...}) do
        for i, v in ipairs(tableImageData) do
            if v.url == str or v.name == str then
                return i
            end
        end
    end
    return nil
end

--Round number (num) to the Nth decimal (dec)
function round(num, dec)
  local mult = 10^(dec or 0)
  return math.floor(num * mult + 0.5) / mult
end

--Locates a button with a helper function
function findButton(obj, func)
    if func==nil then error("No func supplied to findButton") end
    for _, v in ipairs(obj.getButtons()) do
        if func(v) then
            return v
        end
    end
    return nil
end



--Creation of buttons/inputs



function createOpenCloseButton()
    local tooltip = "Open Table Control Panel"
    if controlActive then
        tooltip = "Close Table Control Panel"
    end
    self.createButton({
        click_function="click_toggleControl", function_owner=self,
        position={0,0,0}, rotation={-45,0,0}, height=400, width=400,
        color={1,1,1,0}, tooltip=tooltip
    })
end

function createSurfaceInput()
    local currentURL = obj_surface.getCustomObject().diffuse
    local nickname = ""
    if findInImageDataIndex(currentURL) ~= nil then
        nickname = tableImageData[findInImageDataIndex(currentURL)].name
    end
    self.createInput({
        label="Nickname", input_function="none", function_owner=self,
        alignment=3, position={0,0,2}, height=224, width=4000,
        font_size=200, tooltip="Enter nickname for table image (only used for save)",
        value=nickname
    })
    self.createInput({
        label="URL", input_function="none", function_owner=self,
        alignment=3, position={0,0,3}, height=224, width=4000,
        font_size=200, tooltip="Enter URL for tabletop image",
        value=currentURL
    })
end

function createSurfaceButtons()
    --Label
    self.createButton({
        label="Tabletop Surface Image", click_function="none",
        position={0,0,1}, height=0, width=0, font_size=300, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
    --Functional
    self.createButton({
        label="Apply Image\nTo Table", click_function="click_applySurface",
        function_owner=self, tooltip="Apply URL as table image",
        position={2,0,4}, height=440, width=1400, font_size=200,
    })
    self.createButton({
        label="Save Image\nTo Memory", click_function="click_saveSurface",
        function_owner=self, tooltip="Record URL into memory (requires nickname)",
        position={-2,0,4}, height=440, width=1400, font_size=200,
    })
    --Label
    self.createButton({
        label="Load From Memory", click_function="none",
        position={0,0,5.5}, height=0, width=0, font_size=300, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
    --Saves, created dynamically from memory file
    for i, memoryEntry in ipairs(tableImageData) do
        --Load
        local funcName = i.."loadMemory"
        local func = function(x,y) click_loadMemory(x,y,i) end
        self.setVar(funcName, func)
        self.createButton({
            label=memoryEntry.name, click_function=funcName,
            function_owner=self, tooltip=memoryEntry.url, font_size=200,
            position={-0.6,0,6.5+0.5*(i-1)}, height=240, width=3300,
        })
        --Delete
        local funcName = i.."deleteMemory"
        local func = function(x,y) click_deleteMemory(x,y,i) end
        self.setVar(funcName, func)
        self.createButton({
            label="DELETE", click_function=funcName,
            function_owner=self, tooltip="",
            position={3.6,0,6.5+0.5*(i-1)}, height=240, width=600,
            font_size=160, font_color={1,0,0}, color={0.8,0.8,0.8}
        })
    end
end

function createScaleInput()
    self.createInput({
        label=string.char(8644), input_function="none", function_owner=self,
        alignment=3, position={-8.5,0,2}, height=224, width=400,
        font_size=200, tooltip="Table Width",
        value=round(obj_side_top.getScale().x, 1)
    })
    self.createInput({
        label=string.char(8645), input_function="none", function_owner=self,
        alignment=3, position={-7.5,0,2}, height=224, width=400,
        font_size=200, tooltip="Table Depth",
        value=round(obj_side_lef.getScale().x, 1)
    })
end

function createScaleButtons()
    --Labels
    self.createButton({
        label="Table Scale", click_function="none",
        position={-8,0,1}, height=0, width=0, font_size=300, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
    self.createButton({
        label=string.char(8644).."            "..string.char(8645),
        click_function="none",
        position={-8,0,2}, height=0, width=0, font_size=300, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
    self.createButton({
        label="Move Hands:", click_function="none",
        position={-8.3,0,3}, height=0, width=0, font_size=200, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
    --Disabled due to me removing the feature for technical reasons
    --[[
    self.createButton({
        label="Scale Hands:", click_function="none",
        position={-8.3,0,4}, height=0, width=0, font_size=200, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
    ]]
    --Checkboxes
    local label = ""
    if checkData.move == true then label = string.char(10008) end
    self.createButton({
        label=label, click_function="click_checkMove",
        function_owner=self, tooltip="Check to move hands when table is rescaled",
        position={-6.8,0,3}, height=224, width=224, font_size=200,
    })
    --[[
    local label = ""
    if checkData.scale == true then label = string.char(10008) end
    self.createButton({
        label=label, click_function="click_checkScale",
        function_owner=self, tooltip="Check to scale the width of hands when table is rescaled",
        position={-6.8,0,4}, height=224, width=224, font_size=200,
    })
    ]]
    --Apply button
    self.createButton({
        label="Apply Scale", click_function="click_applyScale",
        function_owner=self, tooltip="Apply width/depth to table",
        position={-8,0,4}, height=440, width=1400, font_size=200,
    })
end

-- Universal Counter Tokens      original coded by: MrStump

--Saves the count value into a table (data_to_save) then encodes it into the Tabletop save
function onSave()
    local data_to_save = {saved_count = count}
    saved_data = JSON.encode(data_to_save)
    return saved_data
end

--Loads the saved data then creates the buttons
function onload(saved_data)
    generateButtonParamiters()
    --Checks if there is a saved data. If there is, it gets the saved value for 'count'
    if saved_data != '' then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        count = loaded_data.saved_count
    else
        --If there wasn't saved data, the default value is set to 10.
        count = 0
    end

    --Generates the buttons after putting the count value onto the 'display' button
    b_display.label = tostring(count)
    if count >= 100 then
        b_display.font_size = 360
    else
        b_display.font_size = 500
    end
    self.createButton(b_display)
    self.createButton(b_plus)
    self.createButton(b_minus)
    self.createButton(b_plus5)
    self.createButton(b_minus5)
end

--Activates when + is hit. Adds 1 to 'count' then updates the display button.
function increase()
    count = count + 1
    updateDisplay()
end

--Activates when - is hit. Subtracts 1 from 'count' then updates the display button.
function decrease()
    --Prevents count from going below 0
    if count > 0 then
        count = count - 1
        updateDisplay()
    end
end

--Activates when + is hit. Adds 5 to 'count' then updates the display button.
function increase5()
    count = count + 5
    updateDisplay()
end

--Activates when - is hit. Subtracts 5 from 'count' then updates the display button.
function decrease5()
    --Prevents count from going below 0
    if count > 4 then
        count = count - 5
    else
        count = 0
    end
    updateDisplay()
end

function customSet()
    local description = self.getDescription()
    if description != '' and type(tonumber(description)) == 'number' then
        self.setDescription('')
        count = tonumber(description)
        updateDisplay()
    end
end

--function that updates the display. I trigger it whenever I change 'count'
function updateDisplay()
    --If statement to resize font size if it gets too long
    if count >= 100 then
        b_display.font_size = 360
    else
        b_display.font_size = 500
    end
    b_display.label = tostring(count)
    self.editButton(b_display)
end

function generateButtonParamiters()
    b_display = {
        index = 0, click_function = 'customSet', function_owner = self, label = '',
        position = {posX, posY, posZ}, width = 600, height = 600, font_size = 500,
        scale = {scale,scale,scale}

        position = {posX - 0.85*scale, posY, posZ},

    }
end

ContainedObjects.Name: Custom_Token
ContainedObjects.LuaScript:
function onLoad()
    deckBagGUID = 'c8224e'
    deckBag = getObjectFromGUID(deckBagGUID)

    playZoneGUID = 'ecca3e'
    playZone = getObjectFromGUID(playZoneGUID)


    self.createButton({
        click_function = 'newGame',
        function_owner = self,
        label          = 'New Game',
        position       = {1,0.1,-1.65},
        scale          = {0.3,0.3,0.3},
        width          = 800,
        height         = 270,
        font_size      = 150,
        tooltip        = 'Make sure all card are returned to the bag.',
    })

    self.createButton({
        click_function = 'shuffle',
        function_owner = self,
        label          = 'Shuffle',
        position       = {1.65,0.1,-1.65},
        scale          = {0.3,0.3,0.3},
        width          = 800,
        height         = 270,
        font_size      = 150,
        tooltip        = "Use this when the 'Alarm' card is revealed",
    })
end

function newGame()
    returnCards()
    cardsInBag = deckBag.getObjects()
    if #cardsInBag == 10 then
        Wait.time(deployCards, 0.5)
    else
        message = 'Please return all 10 cards to the deck bag'
        broadcastToAll(message, {0.856, 0.1, 0.094})
    end
end

function shuffle()
    returnCards()

    Wait.time(deployCards, 1)
end

function deployCards()
    deckBag.shuffle()
    posX = -21.25
    cardsInBag = deckBag.getObjects()
    for _, card in ipairs(cardsInBag) do
        deckBag.takeObject({
            position          = {posX, 1.70, 36},
            rotation          = {0.00, 180.00, 180.00},
            smooth            = true,
        })
        posX = posX + 4.3
    end
end

function returnCards()
    cardsInZone = playZone.getObjects()
    for _, card in ipairs(cardsInZone) do
        deckBag.putObject(card)
    end
end

    b_display = {

ObjectStates.Name: Custom_Tile
ObjectStates.Description: Set the Contamination Card on the scanner to check to see if you are infected.
ObjectStates.LuaScript:
function onLoad()

    --Build infected tables
    infectedCardGUIDsTable = {'ce6c1a', '3b2df8', '0c2706','bbf75d','7c6a9d','f5fce2','f6d8de'}



end



function onCollisionEnter(collision_info)

    self.createButton(
        {click_function='scanInProgress', function_owner=self, label='Scanning',
        position={0.8,0.3,0}, rotation={0,0,0}, width=550, height=225, font_size=100,
        scale={1,1,1}}
    )

    cardToScanGUID = collision_info.collision_object.getGUID()



    printToAll('Scan Activated...', {0.905, 0.898, 0.172})

    Timer.create({
        identifier     = 'scanCardTimer01',
        function_name  = 'printDots',
        function_owner = self,
        delay          = 0.6,
        repetitions    = 2,
    })

    Timer.create({
        identifier     = 'scanCardTimer02',
        function_name  = 'infectionCardCheck',
        function_owner = self,
        delay          = 2,
    })


end

function printDots()
    self.clearButtons()
    printToAll('...', {1, 1, 1})
    self.createButton(
        {click_function='scanInProgress', function_owner=self, label='.....',
        position={0.8,0.3,0}, rotation={0,0,0}, width=550, height=225, font_size=100,
        scale={1,1,1}}
    )
end

function infectionCardCheck()

    self.clearButtons()

    playerInfected = 'false'

    for _, cardGUID in pairs(infectedCardGUIDsTable) do
        if cardToScanGUID == cardGUID then
            playerInfected = true
            --break
        end

    end

    if playerInfected == true then
        printToAll('You are infected!', {0.856, 0.1, 0.094})
        self.createButton(
            {click_function='removeCard', function_owner=self, label='Infected',
            position={0.8,0.3,0}, rotation={0,0,0}, width=550, height=225, font_size=100,
            scale={1,1,1}, color={0.856, 0.1, 0.094}}
        )

    else
        printToAll('No contamination detected.', {0.118, 0.53, 1})
        self.createButton(
            {click_function='removeCard', function_owner=self, label='Clear',
            position={0.8,0.3,0}, rotation={0,0,0}, width=550, height=225, font_size=100,
            scale={1,1,1}, color={0.118, 0.53, 1}}
        )
    end

end

function onCollisionExit(collision_info)
    self.clearButtons()
end

function scanInProgress()
    printToAll('Please wait scan in progress', {0.956, 0.392, 0.113})
end

function removeCard()
    printToAll('Please remove your card', {0.956, 0.392, 0.113})
end

ContainedObjects.LuaScript:
-- Universal Counter Tokens      original coded by: MrStump
-- Scale and position adapted by kensuaga

--Center positions for the buttons
    posX = 0
    posY = 0.2
    posZ = 0.4

--Scale of the buttons
    scale = 0.45


-- Do not change anything below these line unless you know what you are doing.

--Saves the count value into a table (data_to_save) then encodes it into the Tabletop save
function onSave()
    local data_to_save = {saved_count = count}
    saved_data = JSON.encode(data_to_save)
    return saved_data
end

--Loads the saved data then creates the buttons
function onload(saved_data)
    generateButtonParamiters()
    --Checks if there is a saved data. If there is, it gets the saved value for 'count'
    if saved_data != '' then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        count = loaded_data.saved_count
    else
        --If there wasn't saved data, the default value is set to 10.
        count = 0
    end

    --Generates the buttons after putting the count value onto the 'display' button
    b_display.label = tostring(count)
    if count >= 100 then
        b_display.font_size = 360
    else
        b_display.font_size = 500
    end
    self.createButton(b_display)
    self.createButton(b_plus)
    self.createButton(b_minus)
    self.createButton(b_plus5)
    self.createButton(b_minus5)
end

--Activates when + is hit. Adds 1 to 'count' then updates the display button.
function increase()
    count = count + 1
    updateDisplay()
end

--Activates when - is hit. Subtracts 1 from 'count' then updates the display button.
function decrease()
    --Prevents count from going below 0
    if count > 0 then
        count = count - 1
        updateDisplay()
    end
end

--Activates when + is hit. Adds 5 to 'count' then updates the display button.
function increase5()
    count = count + 5
    updateDisplay()
end

--Activates when - is hit. Subtracts 5 from 'count' then updates the display button.
function decrease5()
    --Prevents count from going below 0
    if count > 4 then
        count = count - 5
    else
        count = 0
    end
    updateDisplay()
end

function customSet()
    local description = self.getDescription()
    if description != '' and type(tonumber(description)) == 'number' then
        self.setDescription('')
        count = tonumber(description)
        updateDisplay()
    end
end

--function that updates the display. I trigger it whenever I change 'count'
function updateDisplay()
    --If statement to resize font size if it gets too long
    if count >= 100 then
        b_display.font_size = 360
    else
        b_display.font_size = 500
    end
    b_display.label = tostring(count)
    self.editButton(b_display)
end



--This is activated when onload runs. This sets all paramiters for our buttons.
--I do not have to put this all into a function, but I prefer to do it this way.
function generateButtonParamiters()
    b_display = {
        index = 0, click_function = 'customSet', function_owner = self, label = '',
        position = {posX, posY, posZ}, width = 600, height = 600, font_size = 500,
        scale = {scale,scale,scale}
    }
    b_plus = {
        click_function = 'increase', function_owner = self, label =  '+1',
        position = {posX + 0.85*scale, posY, posZ},
        width = 250, height = 600, font_size = 200, scale = {scale,scale,scale}
    }
    b_minus = {
        click_function = 'decrease', function_owner = self, label =  '-1',
        position = {posX - 0.85*scale, posY, posZ},
        width = 250, height = 600, font_size = 200, scale = {scale,scale,scale}
    }

end

-- Universal Counter Tokens      original coded by: MrStump
-- Scale and position adapted by kensuaga

--Center positions for the buttons
    posX = 0
    posY = 0.2
    posZ = 0.4

--Scale of the buttons
    scale = 0.45


-- Do not change anything below these line unless you know what you are doing.

--Saves the count value into a table (data_to_save) then encodes it into the Tabletop save
function onSave()
    local data_to_save = {saved_count = count}
    saved_data = JSON.encode(data_to_save)
    return saved_data
end

--Loads the saved data then creates the buttons
function onload(saved_data)
    generateButtonParamiters()
    --Checks if there is a saved data. If there is, it gets the saved value for 'count'
    if saved_data != '' then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        count = loaded_data.saved_count
    else
        --If there wasn't saved data, the default value is set to 10.
        count = 0
    end

    --Generates the buttons after putting the count value onto the 'display' button
    b_display.label = tostring(count)
    if count >= 100 then
        b_display.font_size = 360
    else
        b_display.font_size = 500
    end
    self.createButton(b_display)
    self.createButton(b_plus)
    self.createButton(b_minus)
    self.createButton(b_plus5)
    self.createButton(b_minus5)
end

--Activates when + is hit. Adds 1 to 'count' then updates the display button.
function increase()
    count = count + 1
    updateDisplay()
end

--Activates when - is hit. Subtracts 1 from 'count' then updates the display button.
function decrease()
    --Prevents count from going below 0
    if count > 0 then
        count = count - 1
        updateDisplay()
    end
end

--Activates when + is hit. Adds 5 to 'count' then updates the display button.
function increase5()
    count = count + 5
    updateDisplay()
end

--Activates when - is hit. Subtracts 5 from 'count' then updates the display button.
function decrease5()
    --Prevents count from going below 0
    if count > 4 then
        count = count - 5
    else
        count = 0
    end
    updateDisplay()
end

function customSet()
    local description = self.getDescription()
    if description != '' and type(tonumber(description)) == 'number' then
        self.setDescription('')
        count = tonumber(description)
        updateDisplay()
    end
end

--function that updates the display. I trigger it whenever I change 'count'
function updateDisplay()
    --If statement to resize font size if it gets too long
    if count >= 100 then
        b_display.font_size = 360
    else
        b_display.font_size = 500
    end
    b_display.label = tostring(count)
    self.editButton(b_display)
end



--This is activated when onload runs. This sets all paramiters for our buttons.
--I do not have to put this all into a function, but I prefer to do it this way.
function generateButtonParamiters()
    b_display = {
        index = 0, click_function = 'customSet', function_owner = self, label = '',
        position = {posX, posY, posZ}, width = 600, height = 600, font_size = 500,
        scale = {scale,scale,scale}
    }
    b_plus = {
        click_function = 'increase', function_owner = self, label =  '+1',
        position = {posX + 0.85*scale, posY, posZ},
        width = 250, height = 600, font_size = 200, scale = {scale,scale,scale}
    }
    b_minus = {
        click_function = 'decrease', function_owner = self, label =  '-1',
        position = {posX - 0.85*scale, posY, posZ},
        width = 250, height = 600, font_size = 200, scale = {scale,scale,scale}
    }
end

    local description = self.getDescription()
    if description != '' and type(tonumber(description)) == 'number' then
        self.setDescription('')
        count = tonumber(description)
        updateDisplay()
    end
end

--function that updates the display. I trigger it whenever I change 'count'
function updateDisplay()
    --If statement to resize font size if it gets too long
    if count >= 100 then
        b_display.font_size = 360
    else
        b_display.font_size = 500
    end
    b_display.label = tostring(count)
    self.editButton(b_display)
end



--This is activated when onload runs. This sets all paramiters for our buttons.
--I do not have to put this all into a function, but I prefer to do it this way.
function generateButtonParamiters()
    b_display = {
        index = 0, click_function = 'customSet', function_owner = self, label = '',
        position = {posX, posY, posZ}, width = 600, height = 600, font_size = 500,
        scale = {scale,scale,scale}
    }
    b_plus = {
        click_function = 'increase', function_owner = self, label =  '+1',
        position = {posX + 0.85*scale, posY, posZ},
        width = 250, height = 600, font_size = 200, scale = {scale,scale,scale}
    }
    b_minus = {
        click_function = 'decrease', function_owner = self, label =  '-1',
        position = {posX - 0.85*scale, posY, posZ},
        width = 250, height = 600, font_size = 200, scale = {scale,scale,scale}
    }

end
